ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List repository workflows
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List repository workflows
ActivityMetadata.Description: Lists the workflows in a repository. Anyone with read access to the repository can use this endpoint. If the repository is private you must use an access token with the `repo` scope. GitHub Apps must have the `actions:read` permission to use this endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List repository workflows

Lists the workflows in a repository. Anyone with read access to the repository can use this endpoint. If the repository is private you must use an access token with the `repo` scope. GitHub Apps must have the `actions:read` permission to use this endpoint.

Method: Get

OperationID: actions/list-repo-workflows

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/actions/workflows
